top_comments.comment: Only trees can save our planet, if you think we have another alternative of fossil greenhouse gases you are out of your mind unless you suggest we go back to pre industrial era. Traveling with Camel, lives without electricity and blah blah blah. Rainforest should be protected at all cost.
Influencer??? The media especially the BBC has to stop giving airtime to these narcissits if it wants to be taken seriously.

Ok so no trees- why do we humans think we can do whatever we want??? First of all a "Modern" city but withut thought of trees for shade for oxygen, simply for beauty????  I agree with everyone- that young woman is annoying- focus on folks who 
are "really" dealing with this, who don't have the options...Why is an 
incredibly WEALTHY GOV'T NOT DOING ANYTHING?
